evidence_example.title: RS485 demo
evidence_example.small_descr: RS485 half-duplex communication on FLEX + Multibus daughter board.
evidence_example.long_descr: Two sets of FLEX Full board + Multibus Daughter board + RS485 module. RS485 on UART2 slot (second to right on the multibus board). RS232 module on UART1 slot for Receiver. See README.txt for more info.
